entry.title: Automatic bag carrier
entry.content:
Imagine an automated shopping assistant that follows you around with your bags and clothing. Basically a coat rack on an iRobot roomba, just a bit smarter. We shall call it: The Automatic Bag Carrier or ABC.

This would especially be useful in the winter - it gets pretty hot during those Black Friday fights (Epic Black Friday 2015 fight compilation video inside).

A low budget version of this is a regular coat rack on wheels, although it probably won't follow you far ;).

Happy shopping!
